title: cmd/gc: consider removing old "use delete" suggestion in error
body:
An old error suggestion that could be removed, probably nobody is making this mistake
from pre-Go1 days: "assignment count mismatch: 1 = 2 (use delete)"

http://play.golang.org/p/HKYiGXjCiv

Error message originates here:

http://tip.golang.org/src/cmd/gc/typecheck.c?h=use+delete#L2928
